oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LIFTINGS OF COVARIANT REPRESENTATIONS OF W*-CORRESPONDENCES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DEY, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: noncommuting operators
infinite sequences
hardy algebras
dilations
w*-correspondence
covariant representation
characteristic function
contractive lifting
subisometric lifting
coisometric
completely noncoisometric
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We generalize the notion of subisometric liftings of row contractions for liftings of completely contractive covariant representations of W*-correspondences. A theory of characteristic functions for such liftings of covariant representations is presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INFINITE DIMENSIONAL ANALYSIS QUANTUM PROBABILITY AND RELATED TOPICS, 13(3), 511-523
